name: Chaotic Dungeon - Demo Version
description:
Chaotic Dungeon is a metroidvania with large area.

========== Introduction =========

Young boy is trapped in a chaotic fantasy world, fight against monsters for survival. Explore mystery things and find way to go back his world.

Feature in game:
- Upgrade character's ability.
- Collect spell and switch using spell.
- Save/load game.
- Dark area ( use light 2d effect ).
- Many traps.
- Mini puzzles.
